author: imnotverygood (dog #9001)
install_msg: Usage: `[p]help theme`. Requires the Audio cog to function.
name: Theme
short: Allows you to set a music theme for a specific channel..
description: Ultimate jank, but kind of works. For the time being you have to configure the channel_id and themes in theme.py yourself.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data provided via command by users for the purposes of replaying.
